title: AfDB Approves US$ 15 million Trade Facilitation Loan for UniBank Limited, Ghana (African Development Bank ...
text: ( Source : African Development Bank Group ) The Board of Directors of the African Development Bank (AfDB) approved on Wednesday, October 14 , 2015 , in Abidjan , a US $15-million trade finance line of credit for UniBank Ghana (UniBank) to enhance
